name: Impresa
address: Edifício Impresa, Rua Calvet de Magalhães, 242 Paço de Arcos
shortDescription: Portuguese media conglomerate, headquartered in Paço de Arcos, in Oeiras municipality. It is the owner of SIC TV channel, and Expresso newspaper, among other leading media.

name: Lusa
address: R. Dr. João Couto, Lote C
shortDescription: Portuguese News Agency, is the largest Portuguese news agency, incorporated on 28 November 1986.

name: Global Media Group
address: Rua Tomás da Fonseca, Torre E, 3º
shortDescription: Portuguese media holding company founded by Portuguese sports mogul and FC Porto S.A.D.'s shareholder Joaquim Oliveira.
